profile_positions.description:
Research and Development with the Department of Seismology and Acoustics.

Current focus:
(1) Verification of the Comprehensive Nuclear-Test-Ban Treaty (CTBT) using seismic, hydro-acoustic and infrasound data.

(2) The integration of seismological and acoustical networks and data analysis in the Netherlands for source identification of (induced) earthquakes and acoustic sources in the atmosphere.

I am currently responsible for the operations of KNMI's microbarometer array network and I am interested in synergies with other geophysical techniques and scientific disciplines.
profile_positions.title: Senior Geophysicist

profile_positions.description:
Research for the Atmospheric dynamics Research InfraStructure in Europe (ARISE) project. 

The ARISE project has been funded by the European Commission under the FP7 / Horizon 2020 research infrastructure programs.

R&D focus:
(1) Evaluation of weather and climate models, using innovative remote sensing technologies

(2) Signal processing and development of Advanced Data Products
profile_positions.title: Postdoctoral Researcher

profile_positions.description:
I carried out independent research at the National Centre for Physical Acoustics (NCPA) to obtain the degree of Doctor of Philosophy (Ph.D).

Accomplishments:
(1) Successfully defended my Ph.D dissertation on "Infrasound as Upper Atmospheric Monitor"

(2) I contributed the normal mode and parabolic equation full-wave simulation codes to NCPAprop, the open-source infrasound propagation modelling software package. This package is widely used in the infrasound community worldwide.

(3) Installation and maintenance of (mobile) seismo-acoustic sensor networks, in the US, Ecuador and the Mediterranean region, as part of scientific experiments that have been published in scientific literature.
profile_positions.title: PhD Graduate Researcher

profile_positions.description:
ORFEUS, Observatories & Research Facilities for European Seismology

(1) Design of seismic data processing workflows, (2) Software and website development
